attorneys.attorney_label: LEAD ATTORNEY;ATTORNEY TO BE NOTICED;Bar Status: Admitted/In Good Standing

charges.charge_disposition: $50 MSA, Deft committed to custody of the U. S. Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for 55 mos; deft shall surrender for service of sentence before 2 p.m. on 6/28/96; Supr Release 3 years with 7 special conditions and standard conditions of supr; no fine assessed; Restitution in amount of $207,769.15 for payment to the U. S. Dept of Justice for disbursement to Advocate's Office, 17 TRW/JA 112 Scherz Blvd., Goodfellow AFB, TX 76908, pmt shall begin while deft is incarcerated and bal shall be payable through monthly installments of at least $150 per mo.:
